Ingredients.8: 0.25 cup Cabernet Sauvignon (or other dry red wine)

Directions.1: Heat a Dutch oven over medium-high heat. Add ground beef and cook until brown and crumbly, 5 to 10 minutes. Add Italian seasoning, salt, and granulated garlic; mix to combine.

Directions.2: Stir in marinara sauce, diced tomatoes with liquid, water, and red wine until well combined. Reduce heat to low; add tortellini and cook until warmed through, about 10 to 15 minutes.

Directions.3: Meanwhile, preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).

Directions.4: Add cream cheese to tortellini mixture and stir gently to blend; sprinkle mozzarella cheese over the surface.

Directions.5: Bake in the preheated oven until cheese is melted and golden brown, about 15 minutes. Serve immediately.
